PHRASE.LANG:
Here you can find the Street Moves characters and musical companion from Volume 2 in one affordable bundle. This Bundle includes. 


* Broadway Star (Male) 
 * Boogy Boy (Male) 
 * Swingin' Sister (Female) 
 * Embarrassing Dad (Male) 
 * Companion – Headphones 
 

※ Upon purchase, all items will be added to their corresponding categories. [#Legal]

Ici, vous trouverez les personnages et le compagnon musical du volume 2 de Danse de rue, dans un seul lot à prix abordable. Ce lot comporte : 


* Star de Broadway (Homme) 
 * Boogie Boy (Homme) 
 * Mademoiselle Swing (Femme) 
 * Papa la honte (Homme) 
 * Danse de rue - Casque (Compagnon) 
 

※À l'achat, tous les objets seront ajoutés à leurs catégories correspondantes. [#Legal]

Hier findest du die Street-Moves-Figuren und musikalischen Begleiter aus Folge 2 in einem preisgünstigen Bundle. Dieses Bundle beinhaltet: 


* Broadway Star (männlich) 
 * Boogie Boy (männlich) 
 * Swingin' Sister (weiblich) 
 * Peinlicher Vater (männlich) 
 * Street Moves - Kopfhörer (Begleiter) 
 

※Nach dem Kauf werden alle Gegenstände ihren jeweiligen Kategorien hinzugefügt. [#Legal]

Qui puoi trovare i personaggi e i compagni musicali del volume 2 di Street Moves in un pacchetto unico ed economico. Il pacchetto include: 


* Stella di Broadway (uomo) 
 * Ragazzo da balera (uomo) 
 * Ragazza swing (donna) 
 * Papà imbarazzante (uomo) 
 * Street Moves - Cuffie (compagno) 
 

※Dopo l'acquisto, gli articoli verranno aggiunti alle categorie corrispondenti. [#Legal]

Te presentamos un lote, a un precio módico, que incluye los personajes y el compañero musical del volumen 2 de Movimientos callejeros. En él se incluyen: 


* Estrella de Broadway (hombre) 
 * Chico Boogie (hombre) 
 * Bailarina de swing (mujer) 
 * Padre ridículo (hombre) 
 * Movimientos callejeros: cascos (compañero) 
 

※Al finalizar la compra, los objetos se añadirán a sus categorías correspondientes. [#Legal]

Here you can find the Street Moves characters and musical companion from Volume 2 in one affordable bundle. This Bundle Includes. 
 

* Broadway Star (Male) 
 * Boogy Boy (Male) 
 * Swingin' Sister (Female) 
 * Embarrassing Dad (Male) 
 * Companion – Headphones 
 

※ Upon purchase, all items will be added to their corresponding categories. [#Legal]

여기서 여러분은 하나의 저렴한 번들로 Street Moves의 Volume 2에 포함된 캐릭터와 음악 컴패니언을 만나보실 수 있습니다. 이 번들에는 다음 아이템이 포함됩니다.


* 브로드웨이 스타 (남성) 
 * 부기 보이 (남성) 
 * 스윙 시스터 (여성) 
 * 민망한 아빠 (남성) 
 * Street Moves - 헤드폰 (컴패니언) 


※ 구매하면 모든 아이템들은 해당 카테고리에 추가됩니다. [#Legal]

Here you can find the Street Moves characters and musical companion from Volume 2 in one affordable bundle. This Bundle Includes. 
 

* Broadway Star (Men) 
 * Boogie Boy (Men) 
 * Swingin' Sister (Women) 
 * Embarrassing Dad (Men) 
 * Street Moves - Headphones (Companion) 


※ Upon purchase, all items will be added to their corresponding categories. [#Legal]

你可以在這Vol. 2優惠組合包內找到幾位Street Moves角色和音樂隨身夥伴。本組合包包括以下道具。


* 百老匯巨星（男用） 
 * 不羈男孩（男用） 
 * 窈窕淑女（女用） 
 * 尷尬老爸（男用） 
 * Street Moves - 耳機 (隨身夥伴） 
 

※購買後，各道具將被置於對應的類別內。[#Legal]
